answers.answer: See a new doctor. Any doctor not willing to treat you are atleast tell you what your next steps are...is not worth your time. If your not having a period...then yes you need provera to start it up. If your wanting to try for a baby, then you might you need clomid to help you ovulate....and if your just trying to have some normal cycles to start with I then suggest birth control for maybe 3-6 months, then start with a baby.

question: i just found out i have pcos adnd my doc refuses to give me provera to start my cycle or clomid to ovulate what do i do now??????
title: i just found out i have pcos
